thread.title: Gabriel Jesus returns to Manchester as Brazilian eyes City return before the end of the season
thread.title_full: Gabriel Jesus returns to Manchester as Brazilian eyes City return before the end of the season

author: David Anderson
title: Gabriel Jesus returns to Manchester as Brazilian eyes City return before the end of the season
text:
Gabriel Jesus returns to Manchester as Brazilian eyes City return before the end of the season City are hopeful Jesus might return from his broken metatarsal before the end of the season Share Gabriel Jesus is on the comeback trail for Manchester City (Photo: Michael Steele / Getty) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Gabriel Jesus has returned to Manchester and could make his comeback before the end of the season. 
Jesus is progressing well from the broken metatarsal he suffered last month, which has interrupted his stellar start to his Manchester City career. 
He recently flew to New York to carry out commercial work for City and enjoyed a trip home to Brazil before returning to the UK on Thursday. 
The Brazil striker is still wearing a protective boot and using crutches following an operation in Barcelona on his foot, carried out by Pep Guardiola's favourite surgeon Dr Ramon Cugat. 
Jesus, who was pictured driving around the Trafford shopping centre on a mobility scooter, was ruled out for up to three months initially and City hope the Samba star could return to action in May. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
